//scripts.scss-*: Will embed source maps into the .css file to avoid a Sass source map removal detection bug. Command fails if .sass files are used.
//scripts.scss-compile: Will build all .scss files even if they are not touched. Maybe --update will allow this to be error-free soon: https://github.com/sass/sass/issues/4105
//scripts.asset:generate-pictures: Automatically generate downscaled DPI resolution images and link them to where they are used in the HTML. Might be better suited for Webpack.
//scripts.asset:*: Detect HTML/asset creation/update/removal, and reflect the changes in ./public/.
//scripts.js:minify: Implicitly uses terser's --toplevel and strict mode due to combination of --module with --compress|--mangle.
//scripts.dev:watch: Runs both constituent commands concurrently thanks to the & symbol.

scripts.js:build: npm run js:minify && npm run js:lint
scripts.dev:watch: npm run scss-watch & npm run html:watch
scripts.prod:build: npm run scss-compile && npm run prod:js-build
